attributes.action: change the law for saving premature babies from 24 weeks to 20 weeks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition would give hope to many families who have been through early labour or those who may go through this. Although the survival rate for babies at twenty weeks is low they can survive but only if we try. Many premature babies around the world have been saved at as young as twenty weeks. In one case in America a woman at twenty one weeks went into early labour she told the hospital she was twenty four weeks the hospital didn't check this and they saved her baby to me I feel that everyone who has a premature baby under twenty four weeks is penalized for telling the truth as their babies are left to die and parents are left feeling helpless. I went through a traumatic experience like this my baby was born a day under twenty three weeks and the hospital wouldn't to anything to stop me from going into early labour which they can do or help to get her breathing. If only they tried I don't think I would be as depressed as I was because I would have knew they tried but for many families its the same what ifs we co
